definition: an estimation that is too low, make too low an estimate of
details:
noun
- an estimation that is too low
= synonyms: underestimation, underrating, underreckoning
verb
- make too low an estimate of
= example: make too low an estimate of
= synonyms: underrate
- make a deliberately low estimate
= synonyms: lowball
- assign too low a value to
= example: assign too low a value to
= synonyms: undervalue
